revised_title: Examination and Properties of Rubia munjista and its Dyeing Capabilities
tldr: The author examines the properties and dyeing capabilities of Rubia munjista, also known as East-Indian Madder or Munjeet. The study focuses on the extraction and analysis of munjistine, a colorant derived from munjeet, and its comparison with other madder dyes. The author also investigates the relationship between munjistine, alizarine, and purpurine and their impact on dye fastness and color intensity.
